title: Brutal serial rapist STUNS COPS, confesses to UNSOLVED MURDERS...Serial killer or grab for fame?
itunes:title: Brutal serial rapist STUNS COPS, confesses to UNSOLVED MURDERS...Serial killer or grab for fame?
description:
Between 1991 and 2001, Mark Douglas Burns was a long haul trucker, and he has now been linked to the unsolved rapes of at least 11 women and girls across the country. Last year, law enforcement matched DNA evidence from those cases to a genealogy DNA database. Burns is currently facing 17 charges in Utah, which range from aggravated sexual assault to aggravated burglary to kidnapping. Now from his jail cell, Burns has confessed to at least three murders.

Joining Nancy Grace today to discuss:

  • Ashley Willcott - Judge and trial attorney, Anchor on Court TV, www.ashleywillcott.com 
  • John Wagner - Warner Robins Ga Chief of Police
  • Dr. Michelle Dupre - South Carolina Medical Examiner & Author of “Homicide Investigation Field Guide
  • Dr Bethany Marshall - Psychoanalyst, Beverly Hills, www.drbethanymarshall.com
  • Levi Page - Investigative reporter, Crime Online



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
